reviewText: Every time you play live, visual cues are half the show. This  is very different than making an album exclusive for listening. No reason to go to a LIVE show unless you also get some magic. Body language is huge part of that. So this very simple info helps your thinking flow in the absolute right direction for live music. This is by no means a whole solution, but well worth your while because it gets you thinking in terms of visual cues, which is 50% of every LIVE show.
